item.description:
Authentically delicious food and drinks made fresh to order daily. It's like being in Mexico without getting on a plane. We have reserved the special front table that is surrounded by garden windows.


The restaurant has asked us to guarantee a table of 8, and we're asking you to reserve your spot with a $10 rsvp fee. The $10 will pay the $2 meet up fee and $8 will go towards your tab at the restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Baby Boomers

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Margarita's Mexican Extravaganza
